message: Let's split it 50/50 and start fresh!
I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of going to the next round.  Let's split it 60/40 this time, and see where things go from there.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This 58/42 split is a fair compromise.
I'm sticking with my plan to get a bigger share.  Let's split it 65/35 this time.  If you keep rejecting my offers, we're both going to lose a lot of money.
